title: RPC Toggle Switch
description: Listens to multiple inputs and triggers remote Shelly devices using RPC calls.

title: RPC Shutter Switch
description: Controls 2 remote shutters with 4 inputs and 2 IP addresses. Input:0/2 open, Input:1/3 close the respective shutters.

title: RPC Shutter Switch Single
description: Simplified version with 2 inputs and 1 IP address. Input:0 opens, Input:1 closes the remote shutter.

title: i4 Apply Base Config
description: Sets input:0..3 on Shelly i4 to type button.
